content: this tote was made using making links square by kristin omdhal for the chain reaction afghan project by interweave crochet alle credits goes to the designer of the square i just made a free pattern for anyone who wants to make a tote for them selves that explains how to arrange the squares to make a tote and straps the red yarn in the picture is where i tried to make a bag bigger by just adding row and it does work to make it bigger if you stay with the 2 5 mm crochet hook you should get the needed size to make the tote have fun and enjoy your bag
